hymn.title: O my God, within Thee there is eternal life

layout.singingstanza: O my God, with -- in Thee there is e -- ter -- nal life And this life is ex -- pressed in the Son He has ris -- en, to -- day, as the Spir -- it of life Which in us quick -- ens us, gives us life.

lyrics.stanza: O my God, within Thee there is eternal life And this life is expressed in the Son He has risen, today, as the Spirit of life Which in us quickens us, gives us life.
O behold, from the throne of our God and the Lamb Flows a river of water of life God the source, Christ the fount, God the Spirit the flow, Springing up as a river of life.
